results.summary: The funeral of a Birmingham rapper stabbed after attending a fundraising event for another stab victim takes place.
results.body: <body xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/a23607df-66c3-2947-bd33-4e1db7469507"><image id="70518961"/><paragraph role="introduction">Hundreds of people attended the funeral of a rapper who was stabbed to death after attending a tribute night for another stab victim.</paragraph><paragraph>Joshua Ribera, 18, from Moseley, Birmingham, was killed outside TCs club in Selly Oak, last month.</paragraph><paragraph>He had attended a fundraising event in memory of his friend Kyle Sheehan, 16, who was killed a year ago.</paragraph><paragraph>The funeral service at St Martin's Church in the Bullring started at 13:00 BST. </paragraph><paragraph>Hundreds of people braved wet conditions to attend the service. </paragraph><paragraph>Inside the hearse was a picture of Mr Ribera and a floral tribute spelling out the name Depz, a reference to the rapper's stage name Depzman.</paragraph><paragraph>Armani Deniro Mitchell, 18, of The Green, Northfield, has been charged with murder and appeared at Birmingham Magistrates' Court on 24 September. </paragraph><paragraph>A 19-year-old man also arrested in connection with the death has been released on bail.</paragraph></body>
results.shortFormBody: <shortFormBody xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/a23607df-66c3-2947-bd33-4e1db7469507"><paragraph>Hundreds of people attended the funeral of a rapper who was stabbed to death after attending a tribute night for another stab victim.</paragraph><paragraph>Joshua Ribera, 18, from Moseley, Birmingham, was killed outside TCs club in Selly Oak, last month.</paragraph><paragraph>He had attended a fundraising event in memory of his friend Kyle Sheehan, 16, who was killed a year ago.</paragraph><paragraph>The funeral service at St Martin's Church in the Bullring started at 13:00 BST.</paragraph></shortFormBody>

results.headline: Rapper Joshua Ribera: Funeral at Bullring church
